meanings.sent1: The small dog barked yappingly at the mailman.
meanings.sent2: The chihuahua yapped yappingly at every passerby.
meanings.sent3: The puppy yapped yappingly, trying to get attention.
meanings.sent4: The constant sound of the dog yapping yappingly filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The annoying noise of the dog barking yappingly was hard to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The yappingly dog was a constant source of noise in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The yappingly chihuahua annoyed the neighbors with its constant barking.
meanings.sent3: The yappingly puppy was cute but noisy.
meanings.sent4: The yappingly dog's bark echoed through the house.
meanings.sent5: The yappingly sound of the dog was like a background soundtrack to the day.
